    • Method Detail

      • onSelect

        public abstract boolean onSelect()
        Called when this preference is tapped in a GlassPreferenceActivity
        Returns:
        true if this method does everything needed, false if the GlassPreferenceActivity should show the options in getOptions()

      • getOptions

        public abstract java.util.List<PreferenceOption> getOptions()
        If onSelect() does not return true, this method will be called on click. This method needs to return a non-null value, so that GlassPreferenceActivity can populate a Menu
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of PreferenceOptions

      • onOptionSelected

        public abstract void onOptionSelected(int index)
        If onSelect() is non-null, this method will be called when one of the PreferenceOptions in getOptions() is tapped
        Parameters:
        index -

      • getCard

        public abstract View getCard(Context context)
        Build a View to represent this Preference. getDefaultCard() can generate a View with a title and image.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        a View to represent this Preference

      • playSuccessSoundOnSelect

        public boolean playSuccessSoundOnSelect()
        Return true to have the GlassPreferenceActivity play a success sound on tap, false to play the tap sound

      • getKey

        public java.lang.String getKey()

      • setKey

        public void setKey(java.lang.String key)

        public java.lang.String getTitle()

      • setTitle

        public int getImageResource()

      • setImageResource
